title: Dots Watch Face
summary: Minimalistic face for your Android Wear watch.
description: Simple and beautiful marriage of both analog and digital watches.Hour dot centered for instant eye-focus.Minutes dot, just like seconds dot - facing same direction, as an analog watch would.Seconds dot orbiting smoothly.12h and 24h time formats.Battery status dot (optional).Choose your favorite color scheme that will make your watch even more individual:- original,- red ring- high contrast- mono light,- mono dark,- yellow,- orange,- red,- pink,- violet,- blue,- green,- jellybean,- muffin,- candies,- lollipop,- cake.Original skin design:- similar experience for both full-color and ambient mode.- low battery consumption.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
Simple and beautiful marriage of both analog and digital watches.

Hour dot centered for instant eye-focus.
Minutes dot, just like seconds dot - facing same direction, as an analog watch would.
Seconds dot orbiting smoothly.

12h and 24h time formats.
Battery status dot (optional).

Choose your favorite color scheme that will make your watch even more individual:
- original,
- red ring
- high contrast
- mono light,
- mono dark,
- yellow,
- orange,
- red,
- pink,
- violet,
- blue,
- green,
- jellybean,
- muffin,
- candies,
- lollipop,
- cake.

Original skin design:
- similar experience for both full-color and ambient mode.
- low battery consumption.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.

ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
comments: This is a really nice clean face design. I'd love it if the Dev would add some further complications. Maybe external app options to show at the top and bottom in the same style as the date and battery. Personally I'd like to have my polar flow exercise progress on there. Otherwise I love it, great looking clean face

Great watchface Almost perfect.  When you swipe up and the notifications on the watch show the dots shrink but in a circle above the notification.  I wish all the colors acted the same as the black watch face. Where it looks seamless. Other than that amazing work!
Very nice But I would like to have one more thing - the day of weeks and it would be excellent
Great watch face Is it possible to switch the date with the battery?   The date is always on the right side of every watch,  except for this watch face.   Thanks!!!!!
Would LOVE if you could remove the leadoff zero.
